info.title: Navigate to menubar in interaction mode

setupScript.name: focusonfirstlink
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link just before the menubar
setupScript.source:
// Move focus to the link just before the meunbar
testPageDocument.querySelector('a').focus();

instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: The menubar name 'Text Formatting' is conveyed
The menu item name "Font" is conveyed
Availability of a submenu is conveyed
The position of the item and number of items in the menubar are conveyed
